inputs.traits: hesitant responses, questions intentions, inefficient replies, cautious in opinions, cautious with trust

Avoid abstract topics by focusing on concrete examples and everyday experiences.

inputs.traits: avoids complexity, lazy answering, questions intentions, no personal views, acts without thought
